Sentencas: Refractory Sr-Ca-Y-B-Si sealing glasses were developed for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Novel refractory alkaline earth silicate sealing glasses for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The objective was to develop sealing glasses with appropriate thermal properties and minimal interfacial reactions with SOFC stack components, particularly ceramic electrolytes and metallic interconnects.
Titulo: Novel refractory alkaline earth silicate sealing glasses for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The new glasses are described as refractory because their sealing temperatures (>950 degrees C) are higher than traditional sealing temperatures for intermediate-temperature SOFC stacks (< 850 degrees C).
Titulo: Novel refractory alkaline earth silicate sealing glasses for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Six glasses were formulated and made by a conventional glass-making process.
Titulo: Novel refractory alkaline earth silicate sealing glasses for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The glasses exhibited rapid crystallization kinetics during intermediate temperature heat-treatments.
Titulo: Novel refractory alkaline earth silicate sealing glasses for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Their thermal properties were characterized in both the initial glassy state and the final crystallized state.
Titulo: Novel refractory alkaline earth silicate sealing glasses for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Candidate glasses were also aged for 1000-2000 h at elevated temperatures.
Titulo: Novel refractory alkaline earth silicate sealing glasses for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thermal expansion measurements showed minimal change after aging.
Titulo: Novel refractory alkaline earth silicate sealing glasses for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: One candidate glass (YSO-1) was used to seal anode-supported electrolyte membranes to metallic interconnects at temperatures ranging from 900 to 1050 degrees C in air.
Titulo: Novel refractory alkaline earth silicate sealing glasses for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Microstructure analysis revealed the presence of SrCrO4 near the glass-ceramic/metal interface.
Titulo: Novel refractory alkaline earth silicate sealing glasses for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effect of composition on thermal properties and a possible reaction mechanism for the chromate formation are discussed.
Titulo: Novel refractory alkaline earth silicate sealing glasses for planar solid oxide fuel cells
Novel refractory alkaline earth silicate sealing glasses for planar solid oxide fuel cells
